Jackson Oppenheim

UX Engineer

About Me

UX Engineer and Designer using a background in commercial entertainment to build engaging experiences on the web.

At Pearson VUE, I'm proudly building the future of test taking in an increasingly online world with some of the brightest innovators in the EdTech world. I've designed UX for all scopes: from small things like an accessible drag-and-drop to big things like the interface of AI facial recognition software that's been seen in front of nearly 10M customers!
